body:
👍 
One doesn't have to be logged in to see the projects list, and thus the link. That is exactly how it is working now 👍   Can you also add a test for the guest users as well? https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/862/files#diff-c2b9cf8ee8ca60500d3f7610fbbf65f7R187
